custom_rules: For dental emergencies, tell them to call immediately. Always be reassuring about dental anxiety.

responses.juicebox|cake|snack|food|drink|glass of:
🦷 Post-Appointment Snacks & Drinks:

• It's best to avoid sugary snacks like juice boxes and cake right after your dental visit.
• Choose water or milk instead of sugary drinks.
• If you're hungry, soft foods like yogurt, applesauce, or a banana are gentle on your teeth.

Remember: Drinking water is always a great choice for your smile! 😊
responses.services|offer|best: 🌟 Our best services include cleanings, exams, fillings, and emergency care!
